title: Sailor Brinkley-Cook shares sweet kiss with her beau Ben Sosne after practice session with DWTS' Val
text:
They have been together for at least nine months.

And Sailor Brinkley-Cook seems even more in love with her beau Ben Sosne each day.

On Friday the couple shared a sweet kiss as they waited by the side of a road after Sailor's practice session with her Dancing With The Stars pro partner Val Chmerkovskiy in Los Angeles.

Very public display of affection: Sailor Brinkley-Cook was still wearing her workout gear when she and her beau kissed outside the Dancing With The Stars rehearsal studio on Friday

The 21-year-old daughter of supermodel Christie Brinkley and architect Peter Cook was still wearing her black sports bra, black leggings and sneakers.

She wrapped a black and red plaid around her waist before pulling the garment on for a bit of added warmth.

The slight chill in the air didn't stop Sailor walking arm in arm with Ben.

He was dressed in a grey baggy V-neck sweater, black pants and white sneakers with his long dark blonde hair spilling down his back.

Arm in arm: The 21-year-old gazed lovingly at Ben, whom she's been dating since December

Ben, who is a friend of her brother Jack, has been linked to the Sports Illustrated beauty since December.

The couple has been seen together on multiple times in recent months, including on a trip to Miami in February, and the Caribbean in December.

Meanwhile, Sailor became a last-minute replacement for her mother, Christie, who was forced to pull out when she broke her wrist during a fall in rehearsals before the competition began.

And, to her surprise, she has really enjoyed the experience.

Flashing her flesh: Sailor showed off her tanned and toned abs as she walked next to her beau

Four days ago Sailor shared an Instagram video dancing with Val to Mamma Mia.

She captioned it: 'I will remember this night for the rest of my life. This felt like magic!!

'To be able to dance such a joyous dance routine to Mamma Mia (!!!) is definitely a highlight of my life so far. And with all these amazing dancers!

'I feel overwhelmed with gratitude and excitement to be able to have this experience. Thank you thank you! Let’s do it again next week @valentin !!'
description: The 21-year-old daughter of  model Christie Brinkley and architect Peter Cook was sill wearing her black sports bra, leggings and sneakers when she locked lips with her boyfriend on Friday
